settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.row_content: Yes, we offer international shipping to various countries. However, shipping regulations for alcoholic beverages vary by location. Please check our shipping policy or contact us for more details.

settings.heading: What are the age restrictions for purchasing alcohol from your website?
settings.row_content: You must be of legal drinking age in your country or region to purchase alcohol from our store. Age verification is required at checkout and upon delivery.

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content: Shipping times depend on your location and the selected shipping method. Domestic orders typically arrive within 3-7 business days, while international shipping can take 7-21 business days.

settings.heading: What is your return policy?
settings.row_content: Due to the nature of our products, we do not accept returns on alcoholic beverages unless the item is damaged or incorrect. If you receive a damaged product, please contact us within 48 hours of delivery.

settings.heading: How do I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this tracking number to monitor your shipmentâ€™s progress.

settings.heading: Do you offer special or limited edition collections?
settings.row_content: Yes! We frequently feature exclusive and limited edition alcohol collections. Sign up for our newsletter or follow us on social media to stay updated on new releases.

settings.heading: Still have questions? feel free to contact us.
